benchmark_details.name: Ecologically Valid Benchmarks for Situated Collaboration
benchmark_details.overview: The paper reports initial work towards constructing ecologically valid benchmarks to assess the capabilities of large multimodal models for engaging in situated collaboration, proposing an interactive system-driven approach for data collection and question generation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To construct ecologically valid benchmarks for assessing the capabilities of LMMs in situated collaboration tasks.

data.source: Data collected from users interacting with Sigma, an open-source mixed-reality task assistance system.

methodology.validation: Pilot data collection for refining experimental protocol.
